column5: Every week (usually Tuesday) I will be posting a link to a gem found on the internet. Sometimes it will be fishing related...sometimes not. You all are encouraged to contribute as well. Likely 99% of what I post will be found via StumbleUpon (SU). SU is a free add-on for Firefox or Internet Explorer. It allows you to preset your favourite types of websites and with a click of the button, takes you to a new site that meets the criteria of your preferences. StumbleUpon for IE- http://www.stumbleupon.com/download.php StumbleUpon for Firefox- https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/138/  This week's gem is.. A full lengthed (49 mins) documentary on the making of Pink Floyd's "Dark Side of the Moon". One of Rock's most inspiring and influential albums of all time. http://www.veoh.com/videos/v232601GZem9Hxb
This will be a cool one Rick. Thank you

I am still trying to find my way out of the room..........."THANK YOU VERY MUCH" lol,  almost done, if I can find the time at work to do so....................................... no, I AM NOT playing that game at home, LOL
I bought the album and the 8 track. cassette and now the cd lol.
nice one rick i'll save that & watch it later
no good to me on dial up  but thanks for the tease Rick  Maureen
Awesome! They made one of the greatest pieces of work of last 50 yrs there. I'm not even a huge Pink Floyd fan. Thanks for the link  ehg
Still not their Best, But a historic making. Its Awesome but so is the Wall and a Mometary Lapse in Time.  Thanks Rick, cant wait for your next surprise.

Rick,  I hope I can get this.  I'm a huge floyd fan.  I still have bootlegs on vinyl.  One of them is called "the great gig in the sky" this was recorded in 71-72 with different lyrics than what made the final cut on that epic album  Syd Barretts my hero.  Thanks
Get a haircut ya damn Hippy!!!

Great pick, Rick. Another good watch is "Pink Floyd in Pompei". The Floyd do a live open air concert, in a pompein amphitheater, without any fans. Hey Snog, a good bootleg is "Crackers, damn braces, bless relaxes". And if your head explodes with dark forbodings too...you'll know where I'll be.
